Parameter.name: APPLICATION
Parameter.Description: Class name of application this page belongs to.

XData.name: Style
XData.Description: This Style block contains page-specific CSS style definitions.
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">
.box {
	border: 1px solid #6D84B4;
    border-radius: 10px 10px 10px 10px;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0.4em;
}
.errorMsg {
	color:red;
	font-weight:bold;
	font: 0.8em;
}
#page {
	<!--background-image:url("birlab/img/bg_page.jpg");-->
}
.upper {
	text-transform:uppercase;
}
.enter {
	<!--background-image: url(birlab/img/enter.png");-->
	background-position:center center;
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	width:24px;
}
.pointer {
	cursor: pointer;
}
</style>

Method.name: onloadHandler
Method.Description: This client event, if present, is fired when the page is loaded.

Method.name: %OnSubmit
Method.Description:
This callback is called when a form on this page is submitted. pSubmit is a %ZEN.Submit object containing details of the form submit.
Subclasses override this method.
